iveco.title: AI Engineer
iveco.description: Development of the first Artificial Intelligence processes within IVECO France's design office.
achievements: Creation of a multimodal RAG chatbot using Ollama, LangChain, ChromaDB, Pydantic AI and open-source models (llava, granite3.2-vision, llama3.2-vision)
Deployment of an innovative Multi-Agent system integrating MCP and Function Calling, boosting response quality by 40%
Optimization of information search for designers (reduction of 60% search time)
Collaboration with 3 international teams for digital transformation

chu.title: Data Scientist
chu.description: Implementation of structured data extraction systems with generative AI at CHU de Lille.
achievements: Implementation of structured data extraction systems with generative AI
Performance optimization via open source LLM models (Llama 3.1, Mistral7B, Gemma)
Deployment of an efficient RAG system using Ollama, ChromaDB, HuggingFace
IMPACT: Immediate valorization of 10+ years of unstructured medical data history

eric.title: Data Scientist
eric.description: Analysis of periodic measurement data and development of predictive analysis algorithms.
achievements: Integration and harmonization of data from 500+ samples of periodic measurements
Identification of trends and relationships within cohorts via Statistical Modeling
Development of predictive analysis algorithms with R and Python
